sentences.sContent: I spent one whole night by a swamp behind the road listening to frogs.
sentences.sCn: 我整个晚上都在这条路后面的一个沼泽地旁听蛙鸣。

synos.tran: 使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境
下沉；陷入沼泽；陷入困境；不知所措（过去式swamped，过去分词swamped，现在分词swamping，第三人称单数swamps，名词swampiness，形容词swampy）

words.tran: 沼泽的；湿地的；沼泽多的；松软的

trans.tranOther: land that is always very wet or covered with a layer of water
